responses: what can i do for you?
COVID-19 is the disease caused by SARS-CoV-2, the coronavirus that emerged in December 2019.
COVID-19 is a severe virus, and has caused millions of deaths around the world as well as lasting health problems in some who have survived the illness.

patterns: what are the symptoms of covid-19?
responses: covid-19 symptoms: cough, fever, difficulty breathing, body aches, sore throats, loss of taste or smell, diarrhea, headache, fatigue, nausea, runny nose

patterns: should I take the covid-19 vaccine?
responses: the vaccine prevents you from getting COVID-19 or from becoming seriously ill or dying due to COVID-19
the vaccine prevents you from spreading the virus that causes COVID-19 to others.

patterns: I feel like I have covid-19
responses: If you feel like you have covid-19 symptoms, isolate yourself from others and call the nearest health center to book a covid-19 test.

It is important to follow these general guidelines to stay safe: 1)Get vaccinated 2)always wear a mask in public. 3)keep a safe distance from others (at least 2 meters). 4)keep your hands clean and away from your face.
